title: A Table Near the Band
description: A collection of short stories from English author A.A. Milne, best known for his books about the teddy bear Winnie-the-Pooh.ContentsA Table Near the Band • The Prettiest Girl in the Room • A Man Greatly Beloved • The Rise and Fall of Mortimer Scrivens • Christmas Party • The Three Dreams of Mr. Findlater • The River • Murder at Eleven • A Rattling Good Yarn • Portrait of Lydia • The Wibberley Touch • Before the Flood • The Balcony
author: A.A. Milne
